other_tests.findings: Normal coronary arteries but a slow flow of contrast medium in the coronary bed and an aneurysm of the RCA.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In May 2004, the right coronary artery aneurysm was significantly enlarged, but there was no coronary stenosis and the flow remained slow.

other_tests.findings: Complete disappearance of the aneurysm with the sinus node artery left in situ and a patent anastomosis of the RITA to the distal RCA.
Evidence of atherosclerotic inflammation in the coronary artery aneurysm.
